metadata.title: I'mGonna Gonna Git Me A Woman

xml.lyrics:
Hmm, how long, how long, baby must I live on babe and be your slave?
Hmm, how long, how long, must I live on and be your slave?
Yes, I bring home my paycheck, baby, and you throws it all away
I'm gonna git me a woman to help me reach my goal, yes, yes
I'm gonna find me a woman just to help me reach my goal, hm, mm, mm, mm, mm
'Cause you don't do nothin', baby, but throw my money away
